$ec2Client = new Aws\Ec2\Ec2Client([
    'region' => 'us-west-2',
    'version' => '2016-11-15',
    'profile' => 'default'
]);

$associationID = 'AssociationID';

$allocationID = 'AllocationID';

$result = $ec2Client->disassociateAddress(array(
    'AssociationId' => $associationID,
));

$result = $ec2Client->releaseAddress(array(
    'AllocationId' => $allocationID,
));

var_dump($result);
